mapper.select: SELECT P.PROD_ID as prodId, P.PROD_SELLER as prodSeller, P.PROD_NAME as prodName, P.PROD_PRICE as prodPrice, P.PROD_STOCK as prodStock, P.PROD_DESC as prodDesc, P.PROD_CODE as prodCode, P.PROD_REG as prodReg, P.PROD_UPD as prodUpd FROM PRODUCT_DB P JOIN WISHLIST_DB W ON P.PROD_ID = W.PROD_ID WHERE W.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY W.WISH_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WISHLIST_DB (WISH_ID, MEMBER_ID, PROD_ID, WISH_DATE) VALUES (WISHLIST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{prodId}, SYSDATE)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM WISHLIST_DB WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND PROD_ID = #{prodId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISHLIST_DB WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND PROD_ID = #{prodId}
